duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with clerical duties such as greeting and assisting visitors, answering phones, making copies, filing, making routine deliveries, and managing office equipment and other office supplies.
Assist with the administrative functions of the office by using Microsoft Office programs, such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint and others.
Prepare items for alumni events per event coordinator.
Establish effective ongoing communication with fellow staff.
Actively participate in staff training and scheduled meetings.
Be able to work effectively in a team environment as well as take individual initiative.

education_certification.credential: Must be a current USF student with a Federal Work Study (FWS) award for the current academic year.
